metadata.name: "In a New York Minute"
metadata.description:
There is nothing more persistent than the constant. Inhabitants are frozen in perpetual motion. Churning the big machine; working together all alone. Lost in the effort, for the sake of it. 

Artist: Erik Marin

Collection: Vignette City

Edition: 10/10
